page.title: 17CLUBS, WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: Ashby Magna Women's Institute has at present l8 members and meets the second Tuesday in the month. Meetings start with the formal business and followed by an arranged speaker. Subjects cover a very wide range from cooking to fortune telling. Funding raising events include rummage sales, auctions, bring and buy coffee evenings; for charity carol singing around the village, sponsored knit-in and a valentine supper brought in a total of Â£375 in l985. Varied trips out are organised to theatres, restaurants and factories using member's cars for transport. Members help in other village activities e.g. catering at the Village Fete, cooking the Harvest Supper and provide refreshments and a cake stall at the Christmas Bazaar.
